named-query.name: READ_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.siteName = :siteName AND code.codeType = :codeType ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.siteName = :siteName AND code.codeType = :codeType AND code.value LIKE :value ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.siteName = :siteName AND code.codeType = :codeType AND code.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.siteName = :siteName AND code.codeType = :codeType AND code.value LIKE :value AND code.inactive != TRUE ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE_AND_CODE_DESCRIPTION
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.siteName = :siteName AND code.codeType = :codeType AND code.value LIKE :value AND code.description LIKE :description AND code.inactive = :inactive ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE_AND_CODE_DESCRIPTION
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.siteName = :siteName AND code.codeType = :codeType AND code.value LIKE :value AND code.description LIKE :description ORDER BY code.value
